Description.Name: A Polecat for Hobbes
Description.Details: The Ferret 'Polecat' is armed with a Thumper Cannon, multiple ammo types and FCS Breaching Shot. The Ferret is an advanced 45 ton attack Hovertank, with 10/15 move. It has no turret, its weapons are Front mounted. Standard equipment on all models includes: 7.75 tons of Reactive Armor, Recon Sensors, CASE, Laser AMS, Guardian ECM + IFF Jammer Mk1, Beagle Probe, Advanced Optics Mk1 and the unique quirk 'Slippery Customer'. Owning this item allows you to select an alternate hovertank when using Cargo Vroom's unit deploy ability. Hold Shift while placing the unit after activating the deploy ability to select a unit from among those available.
